events.name: Russian air strikes on Ukrainian cities
events.wd_label: Russian air strikes on Ukrainian cities
events.wd_description: At least 25 people were confirmed dead after Russia launched a series of air strikes on cities across Ukraine, including Kyiv.
events.description: At least 25 people were confirmed dead after Russia launched a series of air strikes on cities across Ukraine, including Kyiv.

events.name: Casualties in Uman
events.wd_description: The attack on blocks of flats in Uman killed 23 people, including four children.
events.description: The attack on blocks of flats in Uman killed 23 people, including four children.

events.name: Casualties in Dnipro
events.wd_description: Another woman and her 3-year-old daughter were killed in the city of Dnipro.
events.description: Another woman and her 3-year-old daughter were killed in the city of Dnipro.

events.name: Rescue efforts and aftermath
events.wd_description: Rescuers and residents were seen working at the sites of the explosions, retrieving belongings, and fixing broken windows several hours after the attack.
events.description: Rescuers and residents were seen working at the sites of the explosions, retrieving belongings, and fixing broken windows several hours after the attack.

events.name: Russian defense ministry statement
events.wd_description: The Russian defense ministry claimed the strikes targeted Ukrainian army reserve units.
events.description: The Russian defense ministry claimed the strikes targeted Ukrainian army reserve units.

events.name: Zelensky's response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that the attack is evidence that further international actions are needed against Russia.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that the attack is evidence that further international actions are needed against Russia.

events.name: Wagner mercenary troops leave Rostov-on-Don
events.wd_description: Troops from the Wagner mercenary group started leaving Rostov-on-Don less than 24 hours after attempting a rebellion, following their chief's order to return to Ukraine to avoid bloodshed.
events.description: Troops from the Wagner mercenary group started leaving Rostov-on-Don less than 24 hours after attempting a rebellion, following their chief's order to return to Ukraine to avoid bloodshed.

events.name: Agreement to de-escalate
events.wd_description: The agreement to de-escalate came after Belarusian leader Alexander Lukashenko held talks with Wagner Group's chief, Yevgeny Prigozhin.
events.description: The agreement to de-escalate came after Belarusian leader Alexander Lukashenko held talks with Wagner Group's chief, Yevgeny Prigozhin.

events.name: Charges against Prigozhin dropped
events.wd_description: Charges against Yevgeny Prigozhin will be dropped, and he will move to Belarus as part of the agreement.
events.description: Charges against Yevgeny Prigozhin will be dropped, and he will move to Belarus as part of the agreement.

events.name: Putin's whereabouts
events.wd_description: Despite reports of Russian President Putin leaving Moscow, his press secretary, Dmitry Peskov, confirmed that the president was still in the Kremlin.
events.description: Despite reports of Russian President Putin leaving Moscow, his press secretary, Dmitry Peskov, confirmed that the president was still in the Kremlin.

events.name: Syria readmitted into the Arab League
events.wd_label: Syria readmitted into the Arab League
events.wd_description: The Arab League's foreign ministers adopted a decision to readmit Syria into the league after more than a decade of suspension.
events.description: The Arab League's foreign ministers adopted a decision to readmit Syria into the league after more than a decade of suspension.

events.name: Immediate effect of readmission
events.wd_description: Syria could resume its participation in Arab League meetings with immediate effect.
events.description: Syria could resume its participation in Arab League meetings with immediate effect.

events.name: Call for resolution of Syrian crisis
events.wd_label: Call for resolution of Syrian crisis
events.wd_description: The Arab League called for a resolution of the crisis resulting from Syria’s civil war, including the flight of refugees and drug smuggling across the region.
events.description: The Arab League called for a resolution of the crisis resulting from Syria’s civil war, including the flight of refugees and drug smuggling across the region.

events.name: Formation of ministerial contact group
events.wd_description: Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Lebanon, Egypt, and the Secretary General of the Arab League would form a ministerial contact group to liaise with the Syrian government and seek a steady solution to the crisis.
events.description: Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Lebanon, Egypt, and the Secretary General of the Arab League would form a ministerial contact group to liaise with the Syrian government and seek a steady solution to the crisis.

events.name: Southeastern Battery Belt Emergence
events.wd_description: The Southeast U.S. is becoming a hub for battery and EV manufacturing due to incentives in the Inflation Reduction Act and the Biden administration's push for decarbonization.
events.description: The Southeast U.S. is becoming a hub for battery and EV manufacturing due to incentives in the Inflation Reduction Act and the Biden administration's push for decarbonization.

events.name: Regional Manufacturing Growth
events.wd_description: The Southeastern U.S. is seeing a surge in billion-dollar battery and EV factory investments, particularly in Georgia and South Carolina.
events.description: The Southeastern U.S. is seeing a surge in billion-dollar battery and EV factory investments, particularly in Georgia and South Carolina.

events.name: New Factories
events.wd_description: Companies like SK Corporation, Freyr, and Hyundai are investing billions in new battery and EV factories in the region.
events.description: Companies like SK Corporation, Freyr, and Hyundai are investing billions in new battery and EV factories in the region.

events.name: Employment Growth
events.wd_description: The new factories are creating thousands of jobs, making battery and EV production significant employment sectors in the Southeast.
events.description: The new factories are creating thousands of jobs, making battery and EV production significant employment sectors in the Southeast.

events.name: Historical Industrial Base
events.wd_description: The Southeast has a legacy of advanced manufacturing and chemical production, which provides a foundation for the current growth in EV manufacturing.
events.description: The Southeast has a legacy of advanced manufacturing and chemical production, which provides a foundation for the current growth in EV manufacturing.

events.name: Chemical Manufacturing Base
events.wd_description: The region built a strong base in chemical and advanced manufacturing industries in the 20th century.
events.description: The region built a strong base in chemical and advanced manufacturing industries in the 20th century.

events.name: Automotive Sector Growth
events.wd_description: The Southeast attracted carmakers over the past few decades, creating a foundation for current EV manufacturing growth.
events.description: The Southeast attracted carmakers over the past few decades, creating a foundation for current EV manufacturing growth.

events.name: Local Lithium Resources
events.wd_description: The region has historical lithium mining operations that could be revived to support the local EV supply chain.
events.description: The region has historical lithium mining operations that could be revived to support the local EV supply chain.

events.name: Kings Mountain Mine
events.wd_description: Albemarle is conducting feasibility studies to potentially reopen the Kings Mountain lithium mine.
events.description: Albemarle is conducting feasibility studies to potentially reopen the Kings Mountain lithium mine.

events.name: Piedmont Lithium Project
events.wd_description: Piedmont Lithium aims to open a new mine in the region, despite facing local opposition.
events.description: Piedmont Lithium aims to open a new mine in the region, despite facing local opposition.
